alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 20 at 3:07AM MDT until April 22 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM FRIDAY TO 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mountain snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Locally higher amounts are possible on the highest peaks. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range and Snowy Range. * WHEN...9 AM Friday until 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous mountain travel due to icy, snow packed roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow. Outdoor recreation could be dangerous to those caught unprepared for winter conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
